game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Retrieve the lost artifact from the ancient ruins
game.description: Travel to the ancient ruins and find the rumored lost artifact. Be wary of traps and potential adversaries along the way.
game.reward: 5000 Gold and The Sword of Eternity

task.description: Use the provided map to navigate through the Heartfelt Forest and locate the ruins.
Search the ancient ruins and find the lost artifact. Be ready for any threats that may appear.
Once you have retrieved the artifact, return to Oakshore Town to claim your reward.
